content.raw:
If I understand correctly, the above PEP is basically a spec for how people should write and normalise their version strings themselves, so that StrictVersion (and other things) will only ever have to parse already-normalised versions. I think. I'm not really quite sure what I'm looking at with that document, actually.

But at any rate StrictVersion looks like it's here to stay
